Structs/ResponseDecoder.html#/s:8Request.name: none
Structs/ResponseDecoder.html#/s:8Request.abstract: A decoder that always returns a () value.

Structs/ResponseDecoder.html#/s:8Request.abstract: Returns the response data unchanged. Never throws an error.

Structs/ResponseDecoder.html#/s:8Request.abstract: Decodes a UTF8 string from the response data.

Structs/ResponseDecoder.html#/s:8Request.name: text(encoding:)
Structs/ResponseDecoder.html#/s:8Request.abstract: Decodes a string from the response data.

Structs/ResponseDecoder.html#/s:8Request.name: json(encoded:decoder:)
Structs/ResponseDecoder.html#/s:8Request.abstract: Decodes a JSON encoded object from some response data.

Structs/ResponseDecoder.html#/s:8Request.name: json(decoder:)
Structs/ResponseDecoder.html#/s:8Request.abstract: Decodes a JSON encoded object from the response data.

Structs/RequestTransportError.html#/s:8R.name: underlyingError
Structs/RequestTransportError.html#/s:8R.abstract: The error that caused the request to fail.

Structs/RequestTransportError.html#/s:8R.name: request
Structs/RequestTransportError.html#/s:8R.abstract: The failed request or nil if the request could not be constructed.

Structs/RequestTransportError.html#/s:8R.name: response
Structs/RequestTransportError.html#/s:8R.abstract: A response received before the error occurred or nil if there was no response.

Structs/RequestTransportError.html#/s:8R.name: httpResponse
Structs/RequestTransportError.html#/s:8R.abstract: A HTTP response received before the error occurred or nil if there was no response or response is not an

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Initialises a new Request with the provided parameters. Default values for optional parameters are defined in

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.name: using(method:)
Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Changes the HTTP method used by a request.

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.name: with(header:)
Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Sets the header of the request to a new value.

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.name: adding(headerField:)
Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Adds the provided field to the request’s header.

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.name: adding(headerFields:)
Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Adds the provided fields to the request’s header.

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.name: setting(headerField:)
Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Sets the provided field in the request’s header.

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.name: with(query:)
Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Sets the query for the request to a new value.

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.name: adding(queryItem:)
Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Appends a new item to the query for the request.

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.name: adding(queryItems:)
Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Appends a collection of new query items to the request.

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.name: adding(queryItems:)
Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Appends a collection of new query items to the request.

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.name: sending(_:)
Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Sets the body provider of the request to body.

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.name: receiving(_:)
Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Sets the response decoder of the request.

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.name: authenticated(with:)
Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Sets the authentication provider for the request.

Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.name: timeout(after:)
Structs/Request.html#/s:8Requests7Reques.abstract: Sets the timeout interval for the request.

Structs/AnonymousRequestProvider.html#/s.name: init(baseURL:)
Structs/AnonymousRequestProvider.html#/s.abstract: Initialises a new request provider with the provided base URL.

Structs/AnonymousRequestProvider.html#/s.name: init(_:)
Structs/AnonymousRequestProvider.html#/s.abstract: Initialises a new request provider with the provided base URL string.

Structs/MediaType/TopLevelType.html.name: TopLevelType
Structs/MediaType/TopLevelType.html.abstract: A top level media type, e.g., application, text, audio etc.

Structs/MediaType/SubType.html.name: SubType
Structs/MediaType/SubType.html.abstract: A sub type of a top level media type, e.g., plain, css, json etc.

Structs/MediaType.html#/s:8Requests9Medi.name: formData
Structs/MediaType.html#/s:8Requests9Medi.abstract: Constructs a multipart/form-data media type using the given boundary.

Structs/Header.html#/s:8Requests6HeaderV.name: init(_:)
Structs/Header.html#/s:8Requests6HeaderV.abstract: Initializes a new Header containing the provided fields.

Structs/Header.html#/s:8Requests6HeaderV.name: add(_:)
Structs/Header.html#/s:8Requests6HeaderV.abstract: Adds field into the header. If a field with the same name already exists, its value is joined with field‘s

Structs/Header.html#/s:8Requests6HeaderV.name: set(_:)
Structs/Header.html#/s:8Requests6HeaderV.abstract: Sets field in the header, replacing any existing values.

Structs/Header.html#/s:8Requests6HeaderV.name: remove(_:)
Structs/Header.html#/s:8Requests6HeaderV.abstract: Removes the field named name from the header, returning the field if it was present.

Structs/Header.html#/s:8Requests6HeaderV.name: contains(_:)
Structs/Header.html#/s:8Requests6HeaderV.abstract: Returns true if the header contains a value for the field named field.

Structs/Header.html#/s:8Requests6HeaderV.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/Header.html#/s:8Requests6HeaderV.abstract: Accesses the value of the header field matching name.

Structs/Field/Name.html.name: Name
Structs/Field/Name.html.abstract: The name of a header field in a HTTP request.

Structs/BodyProvider.html#/s:8Requests12.name: none
Structs/BodyProvider.html#/s:8Requests12.abstract: An empty BodyProvider. This provider never throws an error, removes the Content-Type field of the header and

Structs/BodyProvider.html#/s:8Requests12.name: raw(data:contentType:)
Structs/BodyProvider.html#/s:8Requests12.abstract: A body provider that wraps some raw data.

Structs/BodyProvider.html#/s:8Requests12.name: raw(stream:contentType:)
Structs/BodyProvider.html#/s:8Requests12.abstract: A body provider that wraps a raw input stream.

Structs/BodyProvider.html#/s:8Requests12.name: text(_:)
Structs/BodyProvider.html#/s:8Requests12.abstract: A body provider that produces a UTF-8 encoded body.

Structs/BodyProvider.html#/s:8Requests12.name: json(encoded:using:)
Structs/BodyProvider.html#/s:8Requests12.abstract: A body provider that produces a JSON body representation of a value.

Structs/AuthenticationProvider.html#/s:8.name: init(authenticate:)
Structs/AuthenticationProvider.html#/s:8.abstract: Creates an authentication provider that runs the provided function to add authentication fields to a Header.

Structs/AuthenticationProvider.html#/s:8.name: update(_:)
Structs/AuthenticationProvider.html#/s:8.abstract: Updates a header with the authentication details of the provider.

Structs/AuthenticationProvider.html#/s:8.name: none
Structs/AuthenticationProvider.html#/s:8.abstract: An authentication provider that makes no changes to the header passed to it.

Structs/AuthenticationProvider.html#/s:8.name: bearerToken
Structs/AuthenticationProvider.html#/s:8.abstract: An authentication provider that sets the provided token as a bearer token in the header.

Structs/AuthenticationProvider.html#/s:8.name: basicAuth(username:password:)
Structs/AuthenticationProvider.html#/s:8.abstract: Adds a basic Authorization header field to the header using the provided username and password.

Structs/AuthenticationProvider.html.name: AuthenticationProvider
Structs/AuthenticationProvider.html.abstract: A type that can add authentication fields to a Header.

Structs/BodyProvider.html.name: BodyProvider
Structs/BodyProvider.html.abstract: A type that produces the body of a request and updates the header of a request accordingly.

Structs/CaseInsensitiveString.html.name: CaseInsensitiveString
Structs/CaseInsensitiveString.html.abstract: A String wrapper that implements case insensitive comparison, sorting and hashing methods.

Structs/Field.html.name: Field
Structs/Field.html.abstract: A header field in a HTTP request. A field consists of a key-value pair mapping name onto value.

Structs/HTTPMethod.html.name: HTTPMethod
Structs/HTTPMethod.html.abstract: A method (AKA verb) to be sent in a HTTP request. The standard (HTTP/1.1) headers are implemented as static

Structs/Header.html.name: Header
Structs/Header.html.abstract: A header in a HTTP request. A header consists of a series of fields containing a key and a value. Keys are

Structs/MediaType.html.name: MediaType
Structs/MediaType.html.abstract: A media type (MIME type) used to identify content.

Structs/AnonymousRequestProvider.html.name: AnonymousRequestProvider
Structs/AnonymousRequestProvider.html.abstract: A RequestProviding type to a single API host.

Structs/Request.html.name: Request
Structs/Request.html.abstract: A request for a resource from an API.

Structs.html#/s:8Requests22InvalidReques.name: InvalidRequestURLError
Structs.html#/s:8Requests22InvalidReques.abstract: Indicates a valid URL could not be constructed from a RequestConvertible type.

Structs/RequestTransportError.html.name: RequestTransportError
Structs/RequestTransportError.html.abstract: An error that wraps an error that occurred when executing a network request.

Structs/ResponseDecoder.html.name: ResponseDecoder
Structs/ResponseDecoder.html.abstract: A type that can decode a response type from the raw body of a HTTP response.

Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.name: Resource
Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.abstract: The type encoded in the body of the response for Request.

Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.name: baseURL
Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.abstract: The base URL of the API. Convention dictates that this should not end with a trailing slash.

Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.name: endpoint
Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.abstract: The path to the endpoint of the API. Convention dictates that this should start with a forwards slash.

Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.name: method
Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.abstract: The HTTP method to use with the request.

Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.name: header
Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.abstract: HTTP header to be submitted in the request. Defaults to an empty header.

Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.name: queryItems
Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.abstract: URL query parameters to be submitted in the request. Defaults to an empty array.

Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.name: cachePolicy
Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.abstract: The caching policy to specify when converted to a URLRequest. Defaults to .useProtocolCachePolicy.

Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.name: timeoutInterval
Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.abstract: The timeout interval to specify when converted to a URLRequest. Defaults to 60.0.

Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.name: bodyProvider
Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.abstract: A provider for the body of the request. Default is RequestProvider.none for an empty body.

Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.name: authenticationProvider
Protocols/RequestConvertible.html#/s:8Re.abstract: A provider that adds authentication credentials to the header of the request. Defaults to

Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.name: baseURL
Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.abstract: The base url of all requests to the API. Convention dictates that this URL should not have a trailing slash.

Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.name: request(to:using:)
Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.abstract: Constructs a new request to an endpoint of the API using a specific HTTP method.

Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.name: get(_:from:)
Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.abstract: Constructs a GET request for a resource at an endpoint of the API.

Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.name: post(_:to:)
Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.abstract: Constructs a POST request sending a body of data to an endpoint of the API.

Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.name: put(_:to:)
Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.abstract: Constructs a PUT request sending a body of data to an endpoint of the API.

Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.name: patch(_:with:)
Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.abstract: Constructs a PATCH request sending a body of data to an endpoint of the API.

Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.name: delete(_:)
Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.abstract: Constructs a DELETE request for a resource at an endpoint of the API.

Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.name: head(_:)
Protocols/RequestProviding.html#/s:8Requ.abstract: Constructs a HEAD request for the headers of a resource at an endpoint of the API.

Protocols/RequestProviding.html.name: RequestProviding
Protocols/RequestProviding.html.abstract: A type that provides an interface to create requests to an API.

Protocols/RequestConvertible.html.name: RequestConvertible
Protocols/RequestConvertible.html.abstract: A type that can convert itself into a Foundation URLRequest.

Extensions/URLSession.html#/s:So12NSURLS.name: perform(_:validateResponse:decodingQueue:callbackQueue:configureTask:completionHandler:)
Extensions/URLSession.html#/s:So12NSURLS.abstract: Executes a RequestConvertible request and attempts to decode the response body.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa8Requests10Fo.name: init(dictionaryLiteral:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa8Requests10Fo.abstract: Initialises an array of URLQueryItems from a collection of key/value pairs.

Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.name: init(_:)
Extensions/URL.html#/s:10Foundation3URLV.abstract: Initialises a new URL from a static string. Panics if the URL in the static string is invalid.

Enums/RequestError.html#/s:8Requests12Re.name: nonHTTPResponse
Enums/RequestError.html#/s:8Requests12Re.abstract: The server replied with a non HTTP response.

Enums/RequestError.html#/s:8Requests12Re.name: noData
Enums/RequestError.html#/s:8Requests12Re.abstract: The server replied with an empty body when a request was expecting one.

Enums/RequestError.html#/s:8Requests12Re.name: unacceptableResponse
Enums/RequestError.html#/s:8Requests12Re.abstract: The server’s response did not pass the given response validation block.

Enums/RequestBody.html#/s:8Requests11Req.name: data(_:)
Enums/RequestBody.html#/s:8Requests11Req.abstract: A body consisting of the wrapped data.

Enums/RequestBody.html#/s:8Requests11Req.name: stream(_:)
Enums/RequestBody.html#/s:8Requests11Req.abstract: A body whose data is provided by the wrapped stream.

Enums/TextBodyEncodingError.html#/s:8Req.name: utf8EncodingFailed
Enums/TextBodyEncodingError.html#/s:8Req.abstract: The text could not be encoded as utf8 text.

Enums/TextBodyEncodingError.html.name: TextBodyEncodingError
Enums/TextBodyEncodingError.html.abstract: An error thrown when encoding a text request body.

Enums/RequestError.html.name: RequestError
Enums/RequestError.html.abstract: An error that can occur when performing a request.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
